description:
Fedora 40 was just a released a few days ago, and this time around I decided to not look at the flagship edition of Fedora with GNOME.  Instead, I'm looking at Fedora 40 KDE.  The reason is because it ships with Plasma 6 and there have been talks about Fedora making KDE their official desktop.

REFERENCED:
► https://fedoraproject.org/spins/kde/download

title: Looking At Fedora 40 "KDE" (Should THIS Be The Official Fedora Flavor?)
